project.description: Building QT and upload it to download server without reformatting

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: local_download_folder
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The folder where to host download file. Apache server: /var/www/html/download or Nginx (as on 10.0.1.20): /usr/share/nginx/html/download

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: is_dev
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Build a development version. No cleanup.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo checking Jenkins server echo "Bash version ${BASH_VERSION}..." uname -a ls -ahl lsblk df -h echo user: $(whoami)
if grep $build_machine ~/.ssh/config then echo ~/.ssh/config was patched already else echo patching ~/.ssh/config cat <<EOF >> ~/.ssh/config Host $build_machine KexAlgorithms +diffie-hellman-group1-sha1,ecdh-sha2-nistp256,ecdh-sha2-nistp384,ecdh-sha2-nistp521,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256,diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 Ciphers +3des-cbc,blowfish-cbc,aes128-cbc,aes128-ctr,aes256-ctr # KexAlgorithms +diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 # KexAlgorithms +curve25519-sha256@libssh.org # KexAlgorithms +ecdh-sha2-nistp256 # KexAlgorithms +ecdh-sha2-nistp384 # KexAlgorithms +ecdh-sha2-nistp521 # KexAlgorithms +diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256 # KexAlgorithms +diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 EOF fi
#if grep diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 /etc/ssh/sshd_config #then # echo sshd_config was patched already #else # echo patching sshd_config # cat <<EOF >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config #KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group1-sha1,ecdh-sha2-nistp256,ecdh-sha2-nistp384,ecdh-sha2-nistp521,diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256,diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 #Ciphers 3des-cbc,blowfish-cbc,aes128-cbc,aes128-ctr,aes256-ctr #EOF # sudo service sshd restart #fi
ssh-keygen -f "/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/known_hosts" -R $build_machine echo deleting root password in case of chaipcr sshpass -p chaipcr ssh -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$build_machine "passwd -d -u root"
ssh -t -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$build_machine <<'ENDSSH'
if grep diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 /etc/ssh/sshd_config then echo sshd_config on $build_machine was patched already else echo patching sshd_config cat <<EOF >> /etc/ssh/sshd_config KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 KexAlgorithms ecdh-sha2-nistp256 KexAlgorithms ecdh-sha2-nistp384 KexAlgorithms ecdh-sha2-nistp521 KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256 KexAlgorithms diffie-hellman-group14-sha1 #Ciphers 3des-cbc,blowfish-cbc,aes128-cbc,aes128-ctr,aes256-ctr EOF sudo service sshd restart sudo service ssh restart /etc/init.d/ssh restart echo $build_machine patched ifconfig fi
exit 0 ENDSSH
echo returned to host. counter=0 until ssh -t root@$build_machine 'exit 0' do counter=$(( $counter + 1 )) if [ $counter -gt 10 ] then echo Beaglebone is not available. exit 1 fi echo waiting for beaglebone to become connectable- $build_machine. sleep 20
done
ssh -t root@$build_machine 'lsblk; exit 0'
echo done connection check.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash #echo Waiting for the device to come up again #sleep 90#
#echo waiting 30min for the building device to flash #sleep 1800
for i in {0..1800..60} do echo "Waiting for the build device ($build_machine) to become ready! $i" sleep 60
if ping $build_machine -c 2 then echo device is up !! sleep 60
ssh-keygen -f "/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/known_hosts" -R $build_machine ssh -t -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no root@$build_machine <<'ENDSSH' echo $build_machine device is connectable.. lsblk exit 0 ENDSSH
sleep 10 echo returned to host. connection check: counter=0 until ssh -t root@$build_machine 'exit 0' do counter=$(( $counter + 1 )) if [ $counter -gt 20 ] then echo Beaglebone is not available. exit 1 fi echo waiting for ssh on beaglebone to become connectable. sleep 10 done echo ssh is connectable. exit 0 fi done
echo timeout waiting for the device to become ready! exit 1

org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo Starting building Julia on $build_machine apt-get update
apt-get -y -q upgrade apt-get -f -y -q install
exit 0

echo arranging to build julia df -h
apt-get -y -q install g++ ntp ntpdate git unzip automake sshpass build-essential dpkg --configure -a sync sleep 5
currentver="$(gcc -dumpversion)" requiredver="6.0.0" if [ "$(printf "$requiredver\n$currentver" | sort -V | head -n1)" == "$currentver" ] && [ "$currentver" != "$requiredver" ]; then echo "GCC Version is less than 6.0.0" if ! apt-get -q -y install gcc-4.8 g++-4.8 then echo error downloading gcc 4.8.. trying 4.7 apt-get -q -y install g++-4.7 if apt-get -q -y install gcc-4.7 then apt-get clean apt-get autoclean dpkg --configure -a
if [ -e /usr/bin/gcc-4.7 ] then echo gcc 4.7 is installed. rm /usr/bin/gcc rm /usr/bin/g++ ln -s /usr/bin/gcc-4.7 /usr/bin/gcc ln -s /usr/bin/g++-4.7 /usr/bin/g++ else echo Warning: gcc 4.7 could not be installed! fi fi fi if g++ --version | grep 4.6 then echo gcc 4.6 is installed.. upgrading it to 4.7.. apt-get update apt-get -y upgrade dpkg --configure -a apt-get -y install g++-4.7 apt-get clean apt-get autoclean dpkg --configure -a if [ -e /usr/bin/gcc-4.7 ] then echo gcc 4.7 is installed. rm /usr/bin/gcc rm /usr/bin/g++ ln -s /usr/bin/gcc-4.7 /usr/bin/gcc ln -s /usr/bin/g++-4.7 /usr/bin/g++ else echo Warning: gcc 4.7 could not be installed! fi fi
if g++ --version | grep 4.6 then echo "Can't update g++" exit 1 fi else echo "GCC version is greater than 6.0.0" echo "g++ 6 found. Downgrading to 4.9" apt-get remove g++ gcc --purge -y -q rm -r /usr/lib/gcc apt-get autoremove -y -q cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.org echo "deb http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie main contrib non-free" >> /etc/apt/sources.list echo "deb-src http://ftp.us.debian.org/debian/ jessie main contrib non-free" >> /etc/apt/sources.list
apt-get update apt-get install g++-4.9 gcc-4.9 -y -q
cp /etc/apt/sources.list.org /etc/apt/sources.list apt-get update if [ -e /usr/bin/gcc-4.9 ] then rm /usr/bin/gcc rm /usr/bin/g++ ln -s /usr/bin/gcc-4.9 /usr/bin/gcc ln -s /usr/bin/g++-4.9 /usr/bin/g++ echo "installed g++ version 4.9 successfully" else echo "Failed to downgrade g++" fi fi
echo arranging the sdcard
swapoff -a umount /sdcard/* umount /dev/mmcblk0p*
ln -sf /usr/bin/ld /usr/bin/ld.gold echo 1500 > /proc/sys/kernel/hung_task_timeout_secs
LC_ALL=C sfdisk --force -uS --Linux /dev/mmcblk0 <<-__EOF__ ,,0x83,* __EOF__
partprobe /dev/mmcblk0 mkfs.ext4 /dev/mmcblk0p1 -F mkdir -p /sdcard/factory mount /dev/mmcblk0p1 /sdcard/factory/ rm -r /sdcard/upgrade ln -s /sdcard/factory /sdcard/upgrade
# creating a temporary swap file on sdcard sudo fallocate -l 2G /sdcard/factory/swapfile #or dd if=/dev/zero of=/sdcard/factory/swapfile bs=10M count=300 sudo chmod 600 /sdcard/factory/swapfile sudo mkswap /sdcard/factory/swapfile sudo swapon /sdcard/factory/swapfile #verifying swap file is successfully added sudo swapon -s
free -m
#echo Building CMake # cd /sdcard/factory # wget https://cmake.org/files/v3.6/cmake-3.6.1.tar.gz # tar xfv cmake-3.6.1.tar.gz # cd cmake-3.6.1 # ./bootstrap # make # make install # cd .. # rm -r cmake-3.6.1*
#apt-get -y -q install lsb-release #sync #sleep 30 dpkg --configure -a
apt-get autoremove -y -q apt-get -f -y -q install
exit 0

echo compiling TSLib
# TSLib mount /dev/mmcblk0p1 /sdcard/factory/ || true
cd /sdcard/factory mkdir tslib-compile cd tslib-compile/ apt-get -y -q install autoconf automake pkg-config libgtk-3-dev
git clone git://github.com/kergoth/tslib.git cd tslib ./autogen.sh || exit 1 ./configure --prefix=/usr --disable-tools || exit 1 make || exit 1 make install || exit 1 cd ../
ln -s /usr/lib/libts.so /lib/libts-1.0.so.0 cp -P /usr/lib/libts* /lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/
echo building QT
cd /sdcard/factory apt-get update apt-get install -y -q libqt4-webkit libfontconfig1-dev libfreetype6-dev libx11-dev libxcursor-dev libxext-dev libxfixes-dev libxft-dev libxi-dev libxrandr-dev libxrender-dev
wget http://download.qt.io/archive/qt/4.8/4.8.6/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-4.8.6.tar.gz tar xfv qt-everywhere-opensource-src-4.8.6.tar.gz
cd /sdcard/factory/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-4.8.6
cat > mkspecs/qws/linux-arm-gnueabi-g++/qmake.conf << EOF #Rewrite mkspecs/qws/linux-arm-gnueabi-g++/qmake.conf file with following content:
include(../../common/linux.conf) include(../../common/gcc-base-unix.conf) include(../../common/g++-unix.conf) include(../../common/qws.conf)
# modifications to g++.conf QMAKE_CC = gcc QMAKE_CXX = g++ QMAKE_LINK = g++ QMAKE_LINK_SHLIB = g++
# modifications to linux.conf QMAKE_AR = ar cqs QMAKE_OBJCOPY = objcopy QMAKE_STRIP = strip
# tslib QMAKE_CFLAGS += -I/usr/include QMAKE_LFLAGS += -L/usr/lib -lts
QMAKE_INCDIR += /usr/include QMAKE_LIBDIR += /usr/lib
load(qt_config)
EOF #--enable-shared ./configure -prefix /opt/QtEmbedded -opensource -confirm-license -no-qt3support -qt-zlib -no-libtiff -qt-libpng -no-libmng -qt-libjpeg -embedded arm -xplatform qws/linux-arm-gnueabi-g++ -little-endian -qt-freetype -no-opengl -qt-gfx-vnc -qt-gfx-linuxfb -depths 8,16,18,32 -qt-kbd-tty -qt-kbd-linuxinput -qt-mouse-linuxinput -host-little-endian -no-pch -qt-mouse-tslib -nomake demos -nomake examples
make || exit 1 make install || exit 1

echo test finished. cleaning.. swapoff /sdcard/factory/swapfile rm /sdcard/factory/swapfile cd /sdcard/factory/
echo archiving..
if $is_dev then echo Building a development version. No cleanup. arch_filename="qt-everywhere-compiled-4.8.6d.tgz" slim_arch_filename="qt-everywhere-slim-4.8.6d.tgz" else arch_filename="qt-everywhere-compiled-4.8.6.tgz" slim_arch_filename="qt-everywhere-slim-4.8.6.tgz" fi
echo Slim arch filename $slim_arch_filename echo Arch $arch_filename
tar fcz $arch_filename qt-everywhere-opensource-src-4.8.6 tslib-compile tar fcz $slim_arch_filename /opt/QtEmbedded tslib-compile
ls -ahl fcz $arch_filename $slim_arch_filename
sync

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo uploading QT Archive file to server
if $is_dev then echo Building a development version. No cleanup. arch_filename="qt-everywhere-compiled-4.8.6d.tgz" slim_arch_filename="qt-everywhere-slim-4.8.6d.tgz" else arch_filename="qt-everywhere-compiled-4.8.6.tgz" slim_arch_filename="qt-everywhere-slim-4.8.6.tgz" fi
echo Slim arch filename $slim_arch_filename echo Arch $arch_filename
scp -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no -r root@$build_machine:/sdcard/factory/$arch_filename $local_download_folder/ sudo chmod 777 $local_download_folder/$arch_filename #ln -sf $local_download_folder/arch_filename $local_download_folder/qt486-default.tgz
scp -oStrictHostKeyChecking=no -r root@$build_machine:/sdcard/factory/$slim_arch_filename $local_download_folder/ sudo chmod 777 $local_download_folder/$slim_arch_filename #ln -sf $local_download_folder/slim_arch_filename $local_download_folder/qt486-default.tgz
ls -ahl $local_download_folder/$arch_filename $local_download_folder/$slim_arch_filename
exit 0

org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo cleaning up cd /sdcard/factory
if $is_dev then echo Building a development version. No cleanup. arch_filename="qt-everywhere-compiled-4.8.6d.tgz" slim_arch_filename="qt-everywhere-slim-4.8.6d.tgz" else arch_filename="qt-everywhere-compiled-4.8.6.tgz" slim_arch_filename="qt-everywhere-slim-4.8.6.tgz" fi
if $is_dev then echo Building a development version. No cleanup. else echo deleting $arch_filename rm $arch_filename rm $slim_arch_filename
ls -ahl rm -r qt-everywhere-opensource-src-4.8.6* -r rm -r tslib-compile fi
sync ls -ah
echo all done
exit 0
